about_the_game:
Demo contains 70 - 80% of the game.

Collect and crossbreed pathogen girls.
Infect the immune system and turn your host into a slut!

What will you experience in this game?
1. Breed your pathogen girl
2. Main character body will change throughout the game
3. Pregnant enemy girl and your allies sister
4. More than 16 Characters with variate standing image
5. Animated events
6. Pathogen crossbreed love scenes

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains sexual acts, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, interbreed, beastality, body modification, bisexuality, lesbian, etc.
